text: 2:24 Aisaia 53:5; Rom 6:2; 6:11; 7:6; Hibru 9:28Ezɨ Krais en arazir kuraba isa uan mɨkarzim gatɨgha, egha ter ighuvimɨn areme. A kamaghsua, e arazir kuraba bar ada ateghɨva, angamɨra ikɨva arazir aghuibar amuam, kamaghɨn amizɨ an areme. Me a mɨsoghezɨma an mɨzazir dafar kam ia gamizɨ, ia ua dera.
